title: Telepathy - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/24/22
itunes:title: Telepathy - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/24/22
description:
George Noory and Helane Wahbeh discuss her research into telepathy, or mind to mind communication, whether genetic relatedness between mothers and their children influences telepathic abilities and what is the usefulness of this amazing skill.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
